column4: talking about initializing, I think my dvb-t stick wasn't shut down properly in windows and doesn't work with ubuntu now, despite the fact that I diodn'T change anything and it worked for days before, but used win mediacenter to record some stuff and since then me-tv or tvtime or avlc can't get any channels, gonna boot up windows today to prove that theory :)
